text: addehattinre janatayile ahankarikalaya pramanimar parannu: su'aibe, tirccayayum ninneyum ninre kuteyulla visvasikaleyum nannalute nattil ninn purattakkuka tanne ceyyum. allenkil ninnal nannalute margattil matanni varika tanne venam. addeham parannu: nannal atine (a margatte) verukkunnavaranenkil pealum (nannal matannanamennea
